    • Method Detail

      • newSimpleMail

        SimpleMail newSimpleMail()
        Creates and returns a new instance of SimpleMail
        Returns:
        If there is a CA certificate a new instance of SimpleCryptoMail, else a new instance of SimpleMail

      • newTemplateMail

        SimpleMail newTemplateMail(MailTemplate template)
        Creates and returns a new instance of SimpleMail configured with the given template
        Parameters:
        template - The MailTemplate to use
        Returns:
        A new instance of SimpleMail using the given MailTemplate
